structure.unit: RIGHTS OF ACTION AND SURVIVAL OF ACTIONS

law.catch_line: Liability under KRS 411.402 not a bar to other liability
law.text: Civil liability under KRS 411.402 does not preclude civil liability under KRS 411.095, criminal liability under KRS 514.030, or liability under any other applicable law.
law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2008.
